title: What is Agentic AI Reflection Pattern?
content:
Today, in the second article of the series “Agentic AI design patterns,” we will discuss the first pattern: The Reflection Pattern. The Reflection Pattern is a powerful approach in AI, particularly for large language models (LLMs), where an iterative process of generation and self-assessment improves the output quality. We can picture it as a course developer […]
The post What is Agentic AI Reflection Pattern? appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
author: Pankaj Singh
